comments.comments_text: Goal! Jonas Hector (1. FC Koln) ran onto a clever lofted pass from Ondrej Duda and easily beat the keeper with a header into the right side of the goal from close range. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Dominick Drexler (1. FC Koln) beats the defender inside the box and lashes a shot towards the right side of the goal, but Ioannis Gelios makes a brilliant reflex save to deny him. Goalkeeping at its best!
